title: Looking for a bronze duo queue partner/ Any role/ Skype or Curse a must
body:
Okay so I recently climbed to bronze 1 and then school holidays started and I fell back to bronze 5 (flamers/afks/feeders/toxic players etc etc). I know I'm a lot better than riot gives me credit for so I'm looking for a like minded individual that's willing to climb out of bronze with me.

add me in game if you're interested.

IGN: KiwiTorque

replies.body:
Bro I know exactly how you feel. I am very keen to do this I was silver 5 last season and I won 6/10 provisionals this year and got bronze 4 .. Rito plz.. Anyway soon I dropped to bronze five and I have been trying to get up but can never get up to bronze 3 although I have been in many series's. The mains reason is cause I CARRY EVERY GAME. But the feeds the trolls and mostly the dam unskilled players is what annoys me most. 
I will be happy to duo with you..

Feel free to add me bro, still looking for people to duo with during the day Mon-Fri.

I'm actually surprised by how many people have been adding me. Currently on a 7 win streak and just got promoted to bronze 4 xD

You say Mon-Fri during the day ,  are weekends a bad time?
just curious
and interested :p
No, I just found a partner already for evenings and weekends. You can add me though.
